title: Was Ruth Pader Ginsburg called "population growth " when Roe v. Wade was decided?
subtitle: The observations of the Supreme Court judge in an interview in 2009 led to charges that the Supreme Court judge was an advocate for the improvement of birth.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: The United States Supreme Court judge, Ruth Bader Jensburg, said that she agreed to abortion as a means of controlling the population.
